question: where is bonnoure tessa based?
answer: With Bachelor's degree from Ecole Conte, Classe préparatoire aux grandes écoles from Ecole Conte, Baccalauréat scientifique from Lycée privé général Saint-Louis, Bonnoure Tessa has 7 mos of experience as a Assistant styliste at LeherpeurParis in Ville de Paris, Île-de-France, France, 1 yr 4 mos of experience as a Stylist assistant at Bella Jones in Ville de Paris, Île-de-France, France, 2 mos of experience as a Studio couture at PASCALE SMOLSKI MA in Ville de Paris, Île-de-France, France, 2 mos of experience as a Stylist assistant at Rama Marmara ( Etudiante : Central Saint Martins / Collectif : La Capela ) in Ville de Paris, Île-de-France, France, 1 mo of experience as a Habilleuse at Andrew Gn in Ville de Paris, Île-de-France, France and is proficient in Couture, Stylisme, Trend research, Mode, Fiche technique, Analyses des tendances, Contrôle qualité.
